ai-patthana13.9:0.2_0: Living in the teaching, they wake up to sleep.
ai-patthana13.9:1.1_0: Without seeing things that should be given up, they don’t give up causes and conditions for the reason.
ai-patthana13.9:2.1_0: six based on all things that relies on a single day ...
ai-patthana13.9:2.1_3: (This should be expanded in detail as in the previous discourse.)
